pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Micro Exfoliating Cleanser Pump 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

With Native Australian Lime Pearl To Exfoliate And Cleanse Away Impurities, Whilst Evening Complexion.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

With Native Australian Lime Pearl To Exfoliate And Cleanse Away Impurities, Whilst Evening Complexion.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil Phytosterol Esters, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Microcitrus Australasica Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract (Acai), Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract (Goji), Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Vanillin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Lactic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Linalool*. *Natural Component Of Essential Oils

Directions

Application: Apply A Small Amount To Moist Hands And Lather With Water. Gently Massage Into Face And Then Rinse Thoroughly With Water. Suitable For Daily Use.
